segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, like this is normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman ever notices what they’re doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she’s completely ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her, but she really should pay more attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so chaotic, but no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get in trouble if the stool falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
